messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler from "Early Edition"
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/8/03 4:20:12 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... Oooooh, oh yeah, he used to play a pro baseball player in a series that was on about 10 years
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/8/03 4:20:12 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
mummy124@... writes:

> <<Sorry, guess it was someone else! He was the lead actor on "Early
> Edition"
> (about the newspaper that tells the next day's events)and is about to be on
> somr new show with a ton of other great actors this fall - can't remember
> the name. he was also on a great show with Joan Cusack (I love her) that got
> cancelled after one season. >>
>
>
> Okay I think I know who you are talking about. And it wasn't me. I usually
> remember people I want to do! LOL!!!
>
> Mary B
>
>

Oooooh, oh yeah, he used to play a pro baseball player in a series that was
on about 10 years ago. Can't remember the name of that either. Home something
or something home. It was a WWII drama series. DH and I were addicted but it
only lasted, I think, one season.

Rhonda - who thinks Kyle Chandler is do-able and even more so now that I'm
reminded he has a name.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler - New show
messages.msgSnippet: Was this the same guy that was on a show that took place during WWII and he tries to get onto a baseball team?  I m thinking it is....  I watched the first few
messages.messageBody:
Was this the same guy that was on a show that took place during WWII and he tries to get onto a baseball team? I'm thinking it is.... I watched the first few episodes of Early Edition because of that. Unfortunately I didn't like this show enough to watch every week. Having said that I'll have to agree this guy is definitely do-able in my book too. lol I'm really glad to hear what a cool guy really is.

Joyce
(usual lurker since resubbing recently)





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:

<<Sorry, guess it was someone else! He was the lead actor on "Early Edition"
(about the newspaper that tells the next day's events)and is about to be on
somr new show with a ton of other great actors this fall - can't remember
the name. he was also on a great show with Joan Cusack (I love her) that got
cancelled after one season. >>


Okay I think I know who you are talking about. And it wasn't me. I usually

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler - New show
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/8/03 12:42:59 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... He s the guy from Early Edition the time travel show with the newspaper. I was the one who
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/8/03 12:42:59 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
mummy124@... writes:

> Who is Kyle Chandler and was it me who wanted to do him????
>
> Mary B
>

He's the guy from Early Edition the time travel show with the newspaper. I
was the one who said he was do-able, yet I couldn't remember his name!!! LOL I
don't know that you should share that part with him though, he may think I was
calling him a one-nite stand!

Rhonda - who has never had a one-nite stand by the way.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler from "Early Edition"
messages.messageBody:
>>Who is Kyle Chandler and was it me who wanted to do him????

Mary B<<

Sorry, guess it was someone else! He was the lead actor on "Early Edition" (about the newspaper that tells the next day's events)and is about to be on somr new show with a ton of other great actors this fall - can't remember the name. he was also on a great show with Joan Cusack (I love her) that got cancelled after one season.

-Madeline

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Kyle Chandler - New show
messages.messageBody:
From: "glad2bmadly" <glad2bmadly@...>


<<My DH went to high school with Kyle Chandler and they still e-mail each
other. I think kyle is glad to have a friend who is so far removed from the
Hollywood scene. I told DH that someone here (was it Mary?) is a fan and
called him "doable" and he is going to pass on the info. to kyle who i think
will get a big kick out of being added to such a prestigious list of
"doables". I met him twice. He is very grounded and a great dad and
husband, and really cute too!>>


Who is Kyle Chandler and was it me who wanted to do him????

Mary B

messages.subject: Kyle Chandler - New show
messages.msgSnippet: My DH went to high school with Kyle Chandler and they still e-mail each other.  I think kyle is glad to have a friend who is so far removed from the Hollywood
messages.messageBody:
My DH went to high school with Kyle Chandler and they still e-mail each other. I think kyle is glad to have a friend who is so far removed from the Hollywood scene. I told DH that someone here (was it Mary?) is a fan and called him "doable" and he is going to pass on the info. to kyle who i think will get a big kick out of being added to such a prestigious list of "doables". I met him twice. He is very grounded and a great dad and husband, and really cute too!


---------------------------------
